name: Mad Max
quote: You want to get out of here? You talk to me.
description: Whenever another player takes damage you may take that damage in their place.

name: Jim
quote: Oh, no. No, see-see, this is a really shit idea. You know why? Because it's really obviously a shit idea.

name: Robert Neville
quote: Full circle. A new terror born in death, a new superstition entering the unassailable fortress of forever. I am legend.

name: The Mariner
quote: Because I haven't seen it. And I've sailed further than most men have dreamed.

name: Imperator Furiosa
quote: You wanna get through this? Do as I say. Now pick up what you can and run.

name: Aunty Entity
quote: Do you know who I was? Nobody. Except on the day after, I was still alive. This nobody had a chance to be somebody.

name: Judge Dredd
quote: Mega City One. 800 million people living in the ruin of the old world and the mega structures of the new one. Only one thing fighting for order in the chaos: judges.

name: The Interceptor
quote: The last of the V8 Interceptors... a piece of history!

name: Boomstick
quote: Alright you Primitive Screwheads, listen up! You see this? This... is my BOOMSTICK! The twelve-gauge double-barreled Remington. S-Mart's top of the line.
